actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to increase the entitlement ceiling while preserving permanently the special allocation for child day care services (with full Federal matching) which is presently in effect.

summary.text: Amends title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to: (1) increase the total amount allocable to States for social security service; and (2) make permanent the provisions of title XX relating to special allocations for child day care services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to increase the entitlement ceiling while preserving permanently the special allocation for child day care services (with full Federal matching) which is presently in effect.
